messages.message:
i'm a bit confused
• apps created from a Build project have a `project_id`
• you can then use that `project_id` to get the build project's settings
    ◦ see how we already call `useProjectDetails` in multiple places in `pages/ViewApp`
so i don't think any backend changes are necessary? @Weiming Wu
But you can change the project after the fact to switch modes
The app should have something in there to track what the mode was when it was created @Serena
ohh i see, oops yes then we need backend changes to store the mode in the project when the app was created
